properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There was a girl that went to Crown And Bimbo was her name-o B-I-M-B-O, B-I-M-B-O, B-I-M-B-O, And Bimbo was her name-o!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There was a girl that went to Crown, She had large tracts of land-o (Gesture for big tits)-I-M-B-O etc. And Bimbo was her name-o

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There was a girl that went to Crown Her talents they were many-o (gesture for a nice body) (Gesture for big tits)-M-B-O etc. And Bimbo was her name-o

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There was a girl that went to Crown And she made very merry-o (throw arms in air and yell "whee!") (gesture for a nice body) (Gesture for big tits)-B-O etc. And Bimbo was her name-o

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: There was a girl that went to Crown And she was made the Queen-o (put Crown on head) (throw arms in air and yell "whee!") (gesture for a nice body) (Gesture for big tits)-O etc.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: And Bimbo was her name-o There was a girl that went to Crown And she got very pissy-o (point to various members of audience, and say: "You're banished, and you're banished, and....") (put Crown on head) (throw arms in air and yell "whee!") (gesture for a nice body) (Gesture for big tits) And Bimbo was her name-o
